message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'll give you a 50/50 split, but I'll take a slightly larger share this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while. Your turn again!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise considering the inflation.
I'm getting a bit tired of playing games, Bob. Let's get serious about the money.
